description: [Helminth](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0170) has used a scheduled task for persistence.(Citation: ClearSky OilRig Jan 2017)

external_references.description: ClearSky Cybersecurity. (2017, January 5). Iranian Threat Agent OilRig Delivers Digitally Signed Malware, Impersonates University of Oxford. Retrieved May 3, 2017.
